item.title: Rank colors in ::yell? + other
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

How can I make it so like if an admin says something in ::yell his rank is yellow

like this:

@yel[Administrator] Noob: noob

but other colors too like gold silver n stuff

part of code:

if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[Administrator] ";

where and what would i add to make that yellow when an admin does ::yell

Other: How would I fix this? I have a character with player rights 1 and donator 1 but…

if (playerRights == 1 || donator == 1) { titles = "[Donating Moderator] "; } if (playerRights == 2 || donator == 1) { titles = "[Donating Administrator] "; }
well lets say… Moderator has donated and when he does ::yell it says hes a Donating Administrator and not Donating Moderator

Read full topic
